meanings.sent1: Wearing pajamas to a fancy dinner is unseemly.
meanings.sent2: It is unseemly to talk loudly in a library.
meanings.sent3: It would be unseemly to wear a swimsuit to a job interview.
meanings.sent4: His behavior at the funeral was unseemly, like a clown at a solemn event.
meanings.sent5: The unseemly sight of a dog wearing a hat drew everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Not in accordance with accepted standards of behavior
meanings.sent1: Yelling at your teacher is unseemly.
meanings.sent2: Stealing is considered unseemly in every culture.
meanings.sent3: It was unseemly for the mayor to dance on the conference table.
meanings.sent4: His unseemly conduct made him an outcast among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The unseemly act of throwing food in a restaurant shocked the other diners.

meanings.sent1: The oversized hat looked unseemly on her small head.
meanings.sent2: His torn jeans were unseemly for a formal event.
meanings.sent3: The unseemly mismatched socks made him the talk of the party.
meanings.sent4: Her unseemly attempt at singing opera was met with laughter.
meanings.sent5: The unseemly combination of ketchup and ice cream disgusted everyone.
